source_objects.title: Human Resources
source_objects.description: Learn human resources with courses ranging from oracle human capital management to attracting, hiring and retaining the best people.

items.title: Applying Emotional Intelligence for Productive Work Relation

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: In this course we discuss 4 elements of Emotional Intelligence.
objectives_summary: Explore the four dimensions of Emotional Intelligence (EQ) and how they apply professionally and personally.
Identify the business case for using EQ to be fully effective.
Identify what your personal "triggers" are and how stress can create tunnel vision.

items.title: Positive Psychology Applied to Your Company

visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course provides leaders at all levels with an introduction to the science and practice of well-being.
objectives_summary: Recognize your individual character strengths using the handout.
Discover the two key questions in applied positive psychology.
Identify the five dimensions of the PERMA model.

items.title: Identify Handwriting Strokes that Shows Dishonesty
items.headline: Recruiting Accountants, Project Managers, Engineers and HR Positions
objectives_summary: Learn to identify integrity, honesty and trust from handwriting
Identify these important characters before employing the candidates for these job positions
The job positions that need high-level integrity and trust are like Accountants, Human Resource, Project Managers and Engineers

items.title: Recruitment and Hiring Process Management Fundamentals
items.headline: Recruiting, Talent Acquisition : Most fundamental value added HR Processes. Improve your skills and be a best in Hiring.
objectives_summary: Recruitment Process
Steps for Recruitment
How to Improvise Recruitment Process

items.title: HR Questions GPHR Practice Tests 2020
items.headline: HR Questions GPHR Practice Tests 2020
objectives_summary: GPHR

items.title: Defining Cohorts in a Multi-Generational Workplace

visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course explores generational management, as well as work behaviors and preferences related to each generation.
objectives_summary: Explore how generational cohort differences manifest in the work behaviors of individual team members.
Identify generationally-related definitions of the term work, generational assets and liabilities, and generational preferences.
Identify techniques to effectively manage a team consisting of members from numerous generational cohorts.

items.title: SENIOR HR CERTIFIED PROFESSIONAL practice test 2020-2021
items.headline: SENIOR HR CERTIFIED PROFESSIONAL practice test 2020-2021
objectives_summary: HR

items.title: Employment Regulations and Programs (HRCI-PHR/SPHR)
items.headline: Course 16 of 20 of The Human Resources Certification Program (HRCI - PHR/SPHR)
objectives_summary: Employment Regulations and Employee Rights
Individual Employment Rights
Facilitating Positive Employee Relations

items.title: 10 Most Common Unacknowledged Behaviors of the CHRO

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course introduces 10 of the most common, yet often the most “unacknowledged”, behaviors the CHRO.
objectives_summary: Identify behaviors that undermine Chief Human Resource Officer (CHRO) credibility and effectiveness.
Discover the negative impact of old practices on employee morale and motivation, peer expectations, and Board evaluations.
Discover how new behaviors allow the CHRO to be a leader not only within HR but in the whole organization.

items.title: Minimizing the Impact of the Employer Mandate of the ACA

visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course discusses how to avoid/minimize the imposition of the "Employer Shared Responsibility Payment".
objectives_summary: Explore the Employer Mandate Provision of the Affordable Care Act (ACA).
Explore the employer insurance coverage requirements mandated by the ACA.
Recognize when the Employer Shared Responsibility Payment (ESRP) applies, how to compute it and how it will be assessed.

items.title: Systems of Strategic Reward Management

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course discusses the key concepts and controversies in the design and implementation of a strategic reward system.
objectives_summary: Discover the relationship between the external environment, business strategy, HRM strategy and systems of reward management.
Identify theoretical debates and research informing research management practice.
Explore the how to structure reward responses to address the strategic requirements facing an organization.

items.title: Emotional Intelligence in a Challenging Work Environment
items.headline: Balancing mental toughness with compassion in a dramatically revised workplace
objectives_summary: How to use effective emotional intelligence in the workplace to better communicate and connect with others; how to become a better leader
How to use emotional intelligence tools as a way to increase productivity and to not feel stressed at the end of the day or week
How to build trust, repair damaged trust, and yield sustained influence over your team

items.title: [2021] Hack your Job Search
items.headline: The perfect career guide for recent graduates to find their dream job
objectives_summary: analyze the job market, and understand the demand and trends
prepare your application documents cut out for your dream job
automize the application process and be more time efficient

items.title: Situational Judgment Practice test for SHRM CP & SCP
items.headline: SJTs Practice test
objectives_summary: HR Professionals
Situational Judgment practice tests

items.title: Increase Visibility of L&D through Branding & Marketing
items.headline: Branding & Marketing strategies to apply in Learning and Development to make it a well accepted and recognised function
objectives_summary: Learn to establish Learning and Development function as brand in the organisation
Learn to establish centralised communication channels to keep Learning and Development always reachable with ease
Learn how and what to publish to individuals, managers and leadership to keep Learning and Development always in focus
